scripts.test:clean: node -e "require('fs').rmSync('allure-results', {recursive: true, force: true})" && playwright test
scripts.test:allure: node -e "require('fs').rmSync('allure-results', {recursive: true, force: true})" && playwright test && allure generate allure-results --clean && allure open
scripts.allure:clean: node -e "require('fs').rmSync('allure-results', {recursive: true, force: true}); require('fs').rmSync('allure-report', {recursive: true, force: true})"
